import React, { useState, useRef } from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import axios from 'axios'; import { ArrowLeft, Save, Upload, X, Image as ImageIcon } from 'lucide-react'; import './SingleApple.css'; export default function SingleApple() { Â  const navigate = useNavigate(); Â  const fileInputRef = useRef(null); Â Â  Â  const [appleData, setAppleData] = useState({ Â  Â  // Identity & Inventory Â  Â  acno: '', Â  Â  accession: '', Â  Â  acp: '', Â  Â  sd_unique: 'False', Â  Â  ivt: 'PL', Â  Â  sd_moved: 'False', Â  Â  sd_new: 'False', Â  Â  whynull: '', Â  Â  m_transfer_history: '', Â  Â  acimpt: '', Â  Â Â  Â  Â  // Geography & Origin Â  Â  e_locality: '', Â  Â  loc1: '', Â  Â  loc2: '', Â  Â  loc3: '', Â  Â  loc4: '', Â  Â  e_location_field: '', Â  Â  e_location_greenhouse: '', Â  Â  e_origin_country: '', Â  Â  e_origin_province: '', Â  Â  e_origin_city: '', Â  Â  e_origin_address_1: '', Â  Â  e_origin_address_2: '', Â  Â  e_origin_postal_code: '', Â  Â  e_lath: '', Â  Â  e_latd: '', Â  Â  e_latm: '', Â  Â  e_lats: '', Â  Â  e_lonh: '', Â  Â  e_lond: '', Â  Â  e_lonm: '', Â  Â  e_lons: '', Â  Â  e_elev: '', Â  Â  e_habitat: '', Â  Â  site: 'CCG', Â  Â  taxno: '', Â  Â  sitecmt: '', Â  Â Â  Â  Â  // Biology & Taxonomy Â  Â  cultivar_name: '', Â  Â  e_genus: 'Malus', Â  Â  e_species: 'domestica', Â  Â  e_subspecies: '', Â  Â  plant_type: 'apple', Â  Â  family: 'Rosaceae', Â  Â  e_pedigree: '', Â  Â Â  Â  Â  // People & Custodians Â  Â  e_collector: '', Â  Â  e_breeder: '', Â  Â  e_breeder_or_collector: '', Â  Â  e_origin_institute: '', Â  Â Â  Â  Â  // Status & Dates Â  Â  distribute: 'True', Â  Â  status: 'AVAIL', Â  Â  e_alive: 'True', Â  Â  statcmt: '', Â  Â  uniform: '', Â  Â  e_released: '', Â  Â  e_datefmt: '', Â  Â  e_date_collected: '', Â  Â Â  Â  Â  // Collection Details Â  Â  e_quant: '', Â  Â  e_units: '', Â  Â  e_cform: '', Â  Â  e_plants_collected: '', Â  Â Â  Â  Â  // Metadata Â  Â  cmt: '', Â  Â  e_cmt: '' Â  }); Â  const [images, setImages] = useState([]); Â  const [imagePreviews, setImagePreviews] = useState([]); Â  const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false); Â  const [error, setError] = useState(''); Â  const [activeSection, setActiveSection] = useState('identity'); Â  const handleChange = (e) => { Â  Â  const { name, value } = e.target; Â  Â  setAppleData(prevData => ({Â  Â  Â  Â  ...prevData,Â  Â  Â  Â  [name]: valueÂ  Â  Â  })); Â  }; Â  const handleImageChange = (e) => { Â  Â  const files = Array.from(e.target.files); Â  Â Â  Â  Â  if ((images.length + files.length) > 10) { Â  Â  Â  setError('Maximum 10 images allowed'); e.target.value = ''; // Clear the file input to allow re-selection Â  Â  Â  return; Â  Â  } Â  Â  // Validate accession number exists Â  Â  if (!appleData.accession) { Â  Â  Â  setError('Please enter Accession Number first to upload images'); Â  Â  Â  e.target.value = ''; Â  Â  Â  return; Â  Â  } Â  Â  // Create renamed files with accession number // Start index from the number of images already present const startIndex = images.length; Â  Â  const renamedFiles = files.map((file, index) => { Â  Â  Â  const extension = file.name.split('.').pop(); Â  Â  Â  const newName = `${appleData.accession}_${startIndex + index + 1}.${extension}`; Â  Â  Â  return new File([file], newName, { type: file.type }); Â  Â  }); const newFiles = [...images, ...renamedFiles]; Â  Â  setImages(newFiles); Â  Â  // Create image previews Â  Â  const newPreviews = files.map(file => URL.createObjectURL(file)); Â  Â  setImagePreviews(prevPreviews => [...prevPreviews, ...newPreviews]); Â  Â  setError(''); e.target.value = ''; // Clear the file input value Â  }; Â  const removeImage = (index) => { Â  Â  const newImages = images.filter((_, i) => i !== index); Â  Â  const newPreviews = imagePreviews.filter((_, i) => i !== index); Â  Â Â  Â  Â  // Revoke the URL to free memory Â  Â  URL.revokeObjectURL(imagePreviews[index]); Â  Â Â  Â  Â  setImages(newImages); Â  Â  setImagePreviews(newPreviews); Â  Â Â  Â  Â  // Reset file input if all images removed Â  Â  if (newImages.length === 0 && fileInputRef.current) { Â  Â  Â  fileInputRef.current.value = ''; Â  Â  } Â  }; Â  const handleSubmit = async (e) => { Â  Â  e.preventDefault(); Â  Â Â  Â  Â  // Validation Â  Â  if (!appleData.accession) { Â  Â  Â  setError('Accession Number is required.'); setActiveSection('identity'); Â  Â  Â  return; Â  Â  } Â  Â  if (!appleData.cultivar_name) { Â  Â  Â  setError('Cultivar Name is required.'); setActiveSection('biology'); Â  Â  Â  return; Â  Â  } Â  Â  setLoading(true); Â  Â  setError(''); Â  Â  const formData = new FormData(); Â  Â Â  Â  Â  // Append the apple data as JSON Â  Â  formData.append('appleData', JSON.stringify(appleData)); Â  Â Â  Â  Â  // Append each renamed image Â  Â  images.forEach(image => { Â  Â  Â  formData.append('images', image); Â  Â  }); Â  Â  try { Â  Â  Â  const response = await axios.post('http://localhost:5000/api/apples/single-upload', formData, { Â  Â  Â  Â  headers: { Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  'Content-Type': 'multipart/form-data', Â  Â  Â  Â  }, Â  Â  Â  }); Â  Â  Â  alert(`âœ… Successfully created ${response.data.apple.cultivar_name}!`); Â  Â  Â Â  Â  Â  Â  // Clean up image URLs Â  Â  Â  imagePreviews.forEach(url => URL.revokeObjectURL(url)); Â  Â  Â Â  Â  Â  Â  navigate('/dashboard'); Â  Â  } catch (err) { Â  Â  Â  const errorMessage = err.response?.data?.message || 'Failed to create apple.'; Â  Â  Â  setError(errorMessage); Â  Â  Â  console.error('Single upload error:', err); Â  Â  } finally { Â  Â  Â  setLoading(false); Â  Â  } Â  }; Â  const sections = { Â  Â  identity: 'ðŸ“‹ Identity & Inventory', Â  Â  geography: 'ðŸŒ Geography & Origin', Â  Â  biology: 'ðŸ§¬ Biology & Taxonomy', Â  Â  people: 'ðŸ‘¥ People & Custodians', Â  Â  status: 'ðŸ“… Status & Dates', Â  Â  collection: 'ðŸ“¦ Collection Details', images: 'ðŸ“¸ Images', Â  Â  metadata: 'ðŸ“ Metadata' Â  }; Â  return ( Â  Â
